entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @jkenney @ABDanielleSmith That was really one-sided. It failed to mention Sweden's other COVID-19 statistics.  Per https://t.co/dlaW8tgOhc, Sweden has Total 7819 cases/1M pop and 564 deaths/1M pop whereas Canada has 2998/1M pop and 235 deaths/1M pop.  Should we really follow Sweden?
